column1: 說       明： 1.職業災害勞工保護法自91年4月開始實施，本表統計資料自同年7月起編列。

column8: 2.Subsidies 1 to Subsidies 6 shall be paid by month, and the number of case isn't counted repeatedly. Subsidies 7 to Subsidies 10
